name: Stoy 16" Vintage Bicycle Army Green

description: Iconic adjustable high chair that grows with your child, from baby to adult.

name: IKEA Antilop High Chair
description: Lightweight and easy-to-clean high chair with detachable tray.

name: Levoit 600S Smart Humidifier
description: Warm & cool mist, 6L tank up to 50h, app control. Ideal for hotel rooms; comfort for babies and adults.

name: BabyBjörn Potty Training Set
description: Potty training set / potty for toddlers. Ergonomic, easy to clean, BPA-/PVC-free. Great for short stays.

name: Ergobaby Omni Classic (Omni 360)
description: Versatile ergonomic carrier from newborn to toddler. Multiple carry positions, adjustable seat, padded straps.

name: Babyzen YOYO3

name: Babyzen YOYO2 – Combo (2 Pack)

name: Bugaboo Fox – Seat or Bassinet
description: Premium all-terrain stroller with excellent suspension; choose seat or bassinet for your child’s age.

name: Bugaboo Bee5
description: Agile city stroller with reversible seat and compact one-hand fold.

name: Bugaboo Bee6
description: Updated Bee with breathable seat and enhanced suspension for smoother rides.

name: Thule Urban Glide 2 Double
description: Sleek double stroller that glides on any surface; perfect for twins or siblings.

name: Maxi-Cosi Mica Pro Eco – 0–4 Years
description: 360° rotating i-Size seat for 0–4 years with eco fabrics; ISOFIX installation.

name: Bugaboo Turtle Air by Nuna with Wingbase
description: Ultra-light infant seat paired with Isofix Wingbase; can also be used with vehicle belt only.

name: Stoy 10" Vintage Balance Bike White
description: Vintage-style balance bike in white with brown accents for early riders.

name: Yosemite Yellow Bike
description: Cheerful yellow bike with training wheels and rear handle for guidance.

description: Foldable baby bath for newborns up to ~4 years. Non-slip base, heat-sensitive plug.

description: Extra large tub with included newborn support; room to splash and share up to ~6 years.

name: Stokke® Flexi Bath® Combo – Baby Bath & XL Bath
description: Combo of small & XL tubs. Lightweight, portable, easy to store.

name: Stokke Tripp Trapp Newborn Set 2.0
description: Newborn attachment to bring baby to the table from birth.

name: Stokke Tripp Trapp Baby Set 2
description: Back and side support for babies who can sit unaided; includes harness.

name: Baby Carrier Weather Cover
description: Universal winter cover; windproof, water-resistant; fits most carriers.

name: Babybjörn Bouncer (up to 13 kg)

name: Toys & Books – Personalized Set
description: Curated set tailored to age and interests; sanitized and ready for your stay.

name: Baby Winter Snowsuit
description: Insulated, weatherproof one‑piece for cold days; easy zippers and hood.

name: Waterproof Rain Set
description: Light jacket + bib pants with welded seams; great over fleece in spring/autumn.

name: Fleece Overall Layer
description: Soft mid-layer for added warmth under outerwear or cozy indoor wear.
